meanings.definition: The quality of being friendly and pleasant.
meanings.sent1: Her amiableness made everyone feel welcome at the party.
meanings.sent2: The amiableness of the puppy melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: Despite his grumpy appearance, his amiableness shone through in his kind gestures.
meanings.sent4: The amiableness of the small town was like a warm hug to all who visited.
meanings.sent5: The amiableness of the old librarian was as comforting as a cozy blanket on a chilly day.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being agreeable or kind.
meanings.sent1: The amiableness of the team made working together a joy.
meanings.sent2: She exuded amiableness in every interaction, making friends easily.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexpected amiableness towards the dog surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The amiableness of the garden was a peaceful retreat from the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: His constant display of amiableness was a beacon of light in the office.
